mapper.select: select taste_no, taste_member_no, taste_title, taste_content, taste_filepath, to_char(taste_end,'yyyy-mm-dd' )as taste_end, to_char(taste_start,'yyyy-mm-dd' )as taste_start from taste join member on(taste_member_no = member_no) where taste_no =#{tasteNo}
select * from taste join member on(taste_member_no = member_no) where taste_no=1
